app.body.title: Manage Risk.
app.body.looking: If you’re looking for ways to supplement your portfolio, or you just want to learn more about crypto, you’re in the right place.
app.body.sanbase.description: is our flagship web application — learn about how crypto works, watch your favorite coins, and get insights into market behavior from an expert community. And yes, crypto is good for your portfolio!
app.body.sansheets.description: brings Santiment data into your Google spreadsheets. We have several templates — including a portfolio template — available to get you started.
app.body.api.first: Plus, if you’re a developer ready to build your own applications, a robust
app.body.api.second: is available to pump reliable, quickly accessible data into whatever you create.
app.body.more.first: For general information, learn more at
app.body.thankyou.title: Thank You!
app.body.thankyou.description: Your request has been received. Check your email for next steps.
app.body.form.title: Special offer for our Gekkan Kasou Tuuka readers!
app.body.form.description: Subscribe to the monthly newsletter to receive Santiment original metrics, deals and updates.
